participant_1.background:
I bought a card for my first crush on Valentine's Day.
our class is planning a trip to japan.
I am trying to maintain a healthy weight by eating well and exercising regularly.
I have a lust for my neighbor's pool boy, and a need to be creative.
I am not close to my family, but I have a great relationship with my fiance.

participant_2.background:
I am an average weight, but I am not happy with it
i love tacos but hate spaghetti.
i could not live without my dog , bart.
I'm enjoying my creative outlet and getting in touch with my body and mind.
I am widowed.

content.text: I'm doing well! Just finished a project I've been working on all week and I'm feeling accomplished.
That's great! I'm glad to hear you're doing well. I'm about to go on a trip to Japan with my class.
Oh that sounds exciting! I've always wanted to go to Japan. What are you most looking forward to doing there?
I'm really excited to try the food and explore the culture. I've heard the food is amazing there!
I've heard that too! I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it.
So what do you like to do for fun?
I love to cook, go for walks in the park, and spend time with my fiance.
Those all sound like great things to do! I love to cook too, but I don't get to do it as much as I'd like.
I know what you mean. It's hard to find time to cook when you're busy with work and other things.
Well, it was nice talking to you. I have to go now, but I'll talk to you later.
